pr_title: release-0.31.1 to fix one file assumption

timeline.message: release-0.31.1 to fix one file assumption

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - Assumption that only a single configuration was being returned by resolve_config.
          
          
            
            - Regression in 0.31.0 where only a single file was being used when `--config`
          
          
            
              was given a directory with many rules (#2019).```
timeline.author: brendongo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,6 +4,12 @@ This project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html
 
 ## Next
 
+## [0.31.1](https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep/releases/tag/v0.31.1) - 2020-11-11
+
+### Fixed
+
+- Assumption that only a single configuration was being returned by resolve_config.

replies.bodyText: Making it more user facing than internal?
replies.author: brendongo
